Might also want to add, that you need to install ultrasn0w to get it to work, even if you're on AT&T. Just installed it. Works 100%. Cydia had to be run a couple times before it would work properly.

Hacktivated vs. Non-Hacktivated
If you have a Official Carrier SIM, you may choose a Non-hacktivated version since you can activate the unit using your official sim, otherwise, use hactivated.
